dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Aluminum polyethylene tape; Al-PE tape; Aluminium laminated tape; PE-coated aluminium tape; Adhesive aluminium tape; Multi-layer sealing strip
Aluminum polyethylene tape; Al-PE tape; Aluminium laminated tape; PE-coated aluminium tape; Adhesive aluminium tape; Multi-layer sealing strip
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: A roll of sealing tape composed of an aluminium and polyethylene (PE) laminate, measuring 50 mm in width. The product flow data includes information related to its processing level, such as lamination and cutting, compliance with relevant industry standards, quality assessments, applications for which the tape is suitable, manufacturing processes employed, and the primary input materials used. The tape is typically a finished product, ready for use by consumers or for incorporation in further production processes. The availability is denoted by indicating if the tape is distributed directly to consumers or made available at the production plant.
一卷由铝和聚乙烯（PE）层压而成的密封胶带，宽度为50毫米。产品流数据包含了相关的处理级别信息，例如层压和切割，符合相关行业标准，质量评估，胶带适用的应用场合，采用的制造工艺，以及使用的主要输入材料。该胶带通常是一种成品，准备供消费者使用或进一步的生产过程中使用。可用性通过指示胶带是直接分发给消费者还是在生产工厂现场提供来表明。
